title: Red Wine Pitcher With Handle And Stopper, "Chopped edges", 1873
provenance: Around 1885, Crown Prince Rudolf of Austria ordered this set, which was additionally engraved with a monogram and crown.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Dale and Doug Anderson, Anonymous Donor, Arthur Liu, and Prairie Pictures, Inc. and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Mouth-blown crystal, elaborately deep and decorative cutting and polishing

type.name: Red wine pitcher with handle and stopper

participants.person_name: J. & L. Lobmeyr GmbH, Vienna, Austria

exhibitions.title: Ted Muehling Selects: Lobmeyr Glass from the Permanent Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
Red Wine Pitcher With Handle And Stopper, "Chopped edges", 1873.
1873. Glass. Museum purchase through gift of Dale and Doug Anderson, Anonymous Donor, Arthur Liu, and Prairie Pictures, Inc. and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 2009-18-41-a,b.
